Computes average of image list

Calculate the mean of a list of antsImages

antsAverageImages(imageList, normalize = FALSE)

Arguments

imageList

list of antsImages or a character vector of filenames
normalize

boolean determines if image is divided by mean before averaging

Examples

r16 <- antsImageRead(getANTsRData('r16'))
r64 <- antsImageRead(getANTsRData('r64'))
mylist <- list(r16, r64)
antsAverageImages(mylist)
#> antsImage
#>   Pixel Type          : float 
#>   Components Per Pixel: 1 
#>   Dimensions          : 256x256 
#>   Voxel Spacing       : 1x1 
#>   Origin              : 0 0 
#>   Direction           : 1 0 0 1 
#>
